data.name: Evo\Wave Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Do you like synthwave and Evo\Wave? Then it's your lucky day because the soundtrack of the game is now available! To you the evenings with the "vibe" of the ‘80s! Relive your journey through the Vectrex city, Park 64, the beach and the fight against the bad guy MagnaVex!
data.about_the_game: Do you like synthwave and Evo\Wave? Then it's your lucky day because the soundtrack of the game is now available! To you the evenings with the "vibe" of the ‘80s! Relive your journey through the Vectrex city, Park 64, the beach and the fight against the bad guy MagnaVex!
data.short_description: This is additional content for Evo\Wave but does not include the base game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 790 MB available space
